name: Build

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  build_wheels:
    name: Build wheels on ${{ matrix.os }}
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [ubuntu-20.04]

    steps:
        # Checkout the code
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
        
        # Setup the python environment
      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v2
        with:
          python-version: '3.7'

        # Setup CMAKE
        #- name: Setup CMake
        #  uses: jwlawson/actions-setup-cmake@v1.8

        # Setup extra python packages
        #- name: Install requirements
        #  run: |
        #    python -m pip install --upgrade cmaketools setuptools wheel numpy

      - name: Install cibuildwheel
        run: python -m pip install cibuildwheel==1.10.0
            
      #- name: Configure cibuildwheel
      #  shell: bash
      #  run: |
      #      CIBW_BUILD="cp37-*" >> $GITHUB_ENV

      - name: Run cbuildwheel
        run: |
            cibuildwheel
        env: 
            CIBW_BUILD: cp37-*
            CIBW_BEFORE_BUILD: pip install --upgrade cmaketools setuptools wheel numpy; yum install -y cmake swig; rm pyproject.toml; ls

       #- name: Build wheels
       #  run: python -m cibuildwheel --output-dir wheelhouse

       #- uses: actions/upload-artifact@v2
       #  with:
       #    path: ./wheelhouse/*.whl
